oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Senator Taft with a group of men
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Six men standing in a parking lot. A large building is in the distance.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Automobiles; Oak Ridge High School (Tenn.); Young Republican Club
Crosby, Walter A.; Taft, Robert A. (Robert Alphonson), 1889-1953
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of October 24, 1946. Senator Taft of Ohio is on the left, Walter A. Crosby, president of the Young Republican Club, is second from the right.
